title.rendered: NBEMS Exam Calendar 2024: NBE Revised Exam Calendar Out for NEET PG, FMGE, GPAT and others, Check Full Schedule Here |

content.rendered:
NEW DELHI: NBEMS Exam Calendar 2024: The National Board of Examinations in Medical Sciences (NBEMS) has released the revised examination calendar for the academic year 2024-25, outlining important dates for medical admissions. Notably, the National Eligibility-cum-Entrance Test for postgraduate (NEET PG 2024) has been brought forward to June 23. Additionally, the Foreign Medical Graduate Examination (FMGE 2024) scheduled for June has been rescheduled to July 6.
Graduate Pharmacy Aptitude Test (GPAT) 2024
The Graduate Pharmacy Aptitude Test (GPAT) 2024, slated for June 8th, 2024, is a national-level entrance examination for candidates seeking admission to postgraduate pharmacy programmes across India. Conducted by the NBEMS, GPAT assesses candidates’ aptitude in pharmacy and determines their eligibility for various pharmacy courses offered by participating institutions.
NEET-PG 2024
The National Eligibility cum Entrance Test for Postgraduate Medical Courses (NEET-PG) 2024 is a national-level entrance examination for admission to various postgraduate medical courses in India. Scheduled for June 23rd, 2024, NEET-PG assesses candidates’ medical knowledge, clinical reasoning, and problem-solving skills, determining their eligibility for admission to MD/MS/PG Diploma courses.
FMGE June 2024
The Foreign Medical Graduates Examination (FMGE) June 2024, scheduled for July 6th, 2024, is conducted by the NBEMS for Indian nationals with foreign medical qualifications. This examination assesses candidates’ understanding of basic medical concepts and ensures their competency to practice medicine in India after obtaining foreign medical degrees.
NBE Revised Examination Schedule 2024

S. No. Examination Date
1 FNB Exit Examination 2023 April/May 2024
2 NBEMS Diploma Practical Examination – Dec 2023 April/May 2024
3 DNB/DrNB Final Theory Examinations – May 2024 15th-18th May 2024
4 Graduate Pharmacy Aptitude Test (GPAT) 2024 8th June 2024
5 NBEMS Diploma Final Examination – June 2024 14th-16th June 2024
6 NEET-PG 2024 23rd June 2024
7 FMGE June 2024 6th July 2024
8 DNB Post Diploma CET (PDCET) 2024 21st July 2024
9 Diploma in Pharmacy Exit Examination (DPEE) – Oct 2024 5th-6th Oct 2024

Direct link to download the official notice
NBEMS Diploma Final Examination – June 2024
The NBEMS Diploma Final Examination, scheduled for June 14th to 16th, 2024, serves as a comprehensive assessment for candidates completing their diploma courses in various medical specialties. This examination evaluates candidates’ theoretical knowledge, clinical skills, and overall competency in their chosen field, marking the culmination of their diploma training.
FNB Exit Examination 2023
The FNB (Fellowship of the National Board) Exit Examination is an essential assessment for medical professionals pursuing specialized training through fellowship programmes. Scheduled tentatively for April/May 2024, this examination evaluates candidates’ competency and expertise in their chosen specialty, marking the culmination of their fellowship training.
NBEMS Diploma Practical Examination – Dec 2023
The NBEMS Diploma Practical Examination, conducted for the December 2023 session, is designed to assess candidates’ practical skills and proficiency in their respective medical disciplines. Set to take place in April/May 2024, this examination evaluates candidates’ ability to apply theoretical knowledge to real-world scenarios, essential for successful completion of the diploma programme.
DNB/DrNB Final Theory Examinations – May 2024
The DNB (Diplomate of National Board) and DrNB (Diplomate of the National Board) Final Theory Examinations, scheduled for May 15th to 18th, 2024, are comprehensive assessments for candidates pursuing postgraduate medical qualifications. Covering a wide range of medical subjects, these examinations assess candidates’ understanding and proficiency in their chosen specialties, paving the way for them to become certified medical professionals.
DNB Post Diploma CET (PDCET) 2024
The Diplomate of National Board Post Diploma Centralized Entrance Test (DNB PDCET) 2024, scheduled for July 21st, 2024, is an entrance examination for admission to various post-diploma DNB courses offered by accredited hospitals/institutions in India. This examination evaluates candidates’ eligibility and competency for pursuing advanced diploma courses in medical specialties.
Diploma in Pharmacy Exit Examination (DPEE) – October 2024
The Diploma in Pharmacy Exit Examination (DPEE) for the October 2024 session is scheduled for October 5th and 6th, 2024. This examination assesses candidates’ knowledge, skills, and competencies acquired during their diploma in pharmacy programme, marking the culmination of their education and certification process.
